subject: Baseball
Coaches and Managers
World War II (1939-45)
lead_paragraph: Kubek, a Yankees shortstop from 1957 to 1965, recalled how Ralph Houk’s experience as a World War II battlefield hero shaped his leadership qualities as Yankees manager.
snippet: Kubek, a Yankees shortstop from 1957 to 1965, recalled how Ralph Houk’s experience as a World War II battlefield hero shaped his leadership qualities as Yankees manager.
